string.text: Here I...

About, Marked One! Thanks that has helped to beat off fanatics. I want to offer you something... Namely, the possibility of upgrading the suits of our faction. Also, the installation of Pilot Night Vision Devices into suits
Excellent, it that is necessary...
That you can offer on updating of suits?
Night vision, please...
Do you want it installed on a standard suit, or a reinforced one?
On a standard suit...
Excellent... Onto which suit would you like it fitted?

Unfortunately, at groupings the updatings of Exoskeletons, features of their structure to us are not known, therefore I not undertake to modify them...
